tool_description: Due to the Covid19 pandemic, many establishments require people to wear masks indoors. This is done for the safety of individuals and the protection of public health. The Mask Detector model can detect if a person’s face is covered up.
name: Mask Detection
title: Mask Detection

api_list.name: Mask detection from image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mask-detection.p.rapidapi.com/mask-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mask-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mask-detection.p.rapidapi.com/mask-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mask-detection.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
